languages.text: "Надеюсь, что не увижу его на борту даже в качестве сервитора. Впрочем... в таком виде он принесет пользу. Например, сможет драить гальюны". {n}Оплывшее лицо фактотума мрачнеет.{/n} "В тот злосчастный день мы все натерпелись изрядного страху, Лорд-капитан. И все же, говоря откровенно... Господин Войгтвир никогда не был мне приятен, но я считал его человеком, который знает свое дело. Жаль, что я ошибся: главного качества Мастера шепотов — преданности Вольному Торговцу — Кунраду, как оказалось, недоставало самым прискорбным образом".

traits.locale_text: "Надеюсь, что не увижу его на борту даже в качестве сервитора. Впрочем... в таком виде он принесет пользу. Я лично направлю его драить гальюны". {n}Худое лицо Фактотума озаряется злорадной ухмылкой.{/n} "Господин Войгтвир никогда не был мне приятен, но я считал его неплохим специалистом. Теперь, когда я знаю о его связях с Архиврагом, я вынужден пересмотреть свою оценку".

languages.text: "I hope I never see him set foot aboard this vessel again, not even as a servitor. Although... he would be able to do at least some good that way. Someone has to clean the latrines, after all." {n}The Factotum's bloated face grows stern.{/n} "He gave us all quite a fright on that ill-fated day, Lord Captain. And still, to speak candidly... I never enjoyed Master Voigtvir's company, but I believed him to be a man who knew how to do his job. Regretfully, I was mistaken: it turned out Kunrad lacked the most important quality for a Master of Whispers — unwavering loyalty to the Rogue Trader. And his failing came to light in the most deplorable manner."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, что не увижу его на борту даже в качестве сервитора. Впрочем... в таком виде он принесет пользу. Например, сможет драить гальюны". {n}Оплывшее лицо фактотума мрачнеет.{/n} "В тот злосчастный день мы все натерпелись изрядного страху, Лорд-капитан. И все же, говоря откровенно... Господин Войгтвир никогда не был мне приятен, но я считал его человеком, который знает свое дело. I never enjoyed Master Voigtvir's company, but I believed him to be a man who knows his job. Regretfully, I was mistaken: it turned out Kunrad was missing the most important quality for a Master of Whispers, unwavering loyalty to the Rogue Trader."

Regretfully, I was mistaken: it turned out Kunrad lacked the most important quality for a Master of Whispers — unwavering loyalty to the Rogue Trader. And his failing came to light in the most deplorable manner."

languages.text: “我希望再也不会在这艘船上看到他，就算他上船当机仆都不行，虽然……如果他真的当了机仆，多少算是能有点用。毕竟，总得有人去打扫厕所。”{n}詹里斯臃肿的脸变得严厉起来。{/n}“在那个倒霉日子里，他给我们所有人都带来了相当不快的经历，舰长大人。而且，老实说……我从以前就不喜欢维特威尔大师这个人，但我以为他至少会认认真真完成自己的本职工作。遗憾的是，我错了。低语之主最重要的品质，就是对行商浪人矢志不渝的忠诚，但事实证明，昆拉德缺乏这种品质。他以最令人遗憾的方式，让所有人看到了他有多不称职。”
languages.original_text: "I hope I never see him set foot aboard this vessel again, not even as a servitor. Although... he would be able to do at least some good that way. Someone has to clean the latrines, after all." {n}The Factotum's bloated face grows stern.{/n} "He gave us all quite a fright on that ill-fated day, Lord Captain. And still, to speak candidly... I never enjoyed Master Voigtvir's company, but I believed him to be a man who knew how to do his job. Regretfully, I was mistaken: it turned out Kunrad lacked the most important quality for a Master of Whispers — unwavering loyalty to the Rogue Trader. And his failing came to light in the most deplorable manner."

traits.locale_text: “我希望再也不会在这艘船上看到他，就算他上船当奴工都不行，虽然……如果他真的当了奴工，多少算是能有点用。毕竟，总得有人去打扫厕所。”{n}詹里斯臃肿的脸变得严厉起来。{/n}“在那个倒霉日子里，他给我们所有人都带来了相当不快的经历，舰长大人。而且，老实说……我从以前就不喜欢维特威尔大师这个人，但我以为他至少会认认真真完成自己的本职工作。遗憾的是，我错了。低语之主最重要的品质，就是对行商浪人矢志不渝的忠诚，但事实证明，昆拉德缺乏这种品质。他以最令人遗憾的方式，让所有人看到了他有多不称职。”

languages.text: «Espero no volver a verlo a bordo de la nave, ni siquiera como servidor. Aunque... por lo menos así serviría para algo. Alguien tiene que limpiar las letrinas». {n}La cara hinchada del Factótum se vuelve seria.{/n} «Nos dio un susto a todos ese día tan fatídico, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. Y, sin embargo, si le soy sincero... nunca había estado a gusto con el maestro Voigtvir, pero creía que era un hombre capaz de hacer bien su trabajo. Lamentablemente, me equivocaba. Resultó que a Kunrad le faltaba la cualidad más esencial para un maestro de susurros: lealtad incondicional a su Comerciante Independiente. Y esta carencia salió a la luz de la peor manera posible».
languages.original_text: "I hope I never see him set foot aboard this vessel again, not even as a servitor. Although... he would be able to do at least some good that way. Someone has to clean the latrines, after all." {n}The Factotum's bloated face grows stern.{/n} "He gave us all quite a fright on that ill-fated day, Lord Captain. And still, to speak candidly... I never enjoyed Master Voigtvir's company, but I believed him to be a man who knew how to do his job. Regretfully, I was mistaken: it turned out Kunrad lacked the most important quality for a Master of Whispers — unwavering loyalty to the Rogue Trader. And his failing came to light in the most deplorable manner."

traits.locale_text: «Espero no volver a verlo a bordo de la nave, ni siquiera como servidor. Aunque... por lo menos así serviría para algo. Alguien tiene que limpiar las letrinas». {n}La cara hinchada del Factótum se vuelve seria.{/n} «Nos dio un susto a todos ese día tan fatídico, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. Y, sin embargo, si le soy sincero... nunca había estado a gusto con el maestro Voigtvir, pero creía que era un hombre capaz de hacer bien su trabajo. Lamentablemente, me equivocaba. Resultó que a Kunrad le faltaba la cualidad más esencial para un maestro de susurros: lealtad incondicional a su Comerciante Independiente. Y esta carencia salió a la luz de la peor manera posible».

languages.text: 「この船に二度と乗ってほしくはありませんな。たとえ、サーヴィターとしてであっても。ですが…サーヴィターとなれば、最低でも何らかの利益をもたすかもしれません。結局、誰かが汚れ仕事をせねばならないのですから。{n} ファクトタムの肥大した顔が険しくなる。{/n}「あの運命の日、彼は私たち全員を恐怖に陥れたのですよ、ロード・キャプテン。そして、やはり率直に言うとマスター・ボイトヴィルとの日々は、楽しいものではありませんでした。それでも、私は彼ができる男だと信じていました。残念なことに、私は間違っていたのです。クンラッドには、囁きの主の最も重要な資質である、自由開拓者に対する揺るぎない忠誠心が欠落していたことがわかったのです。そして彼の失敗は、最も嘆かわしい形で明るみに出たのです」
languages.original_text: "I hope I never see him set foot aboard this vessel again, not even as a servitor. Although... he would be able to do at least some good that way. Someone has to clean the latrines, after all." {n}The Factotum's bloated face grows stern.{/n} "He gave us all quite a fright on that ill-fated day, Lord Captain. And still, to speak candidly... I never enjoyed Master Voigtvir's company, but I believed him to be a man who knew how to do his job. Regretfully, I was mistaken: it turned out Kunrad lacked the most important quality for a Master of Whispers — unwavering loyalty to the Rogue Trader. And his failing came to light in the most deplorable manner."

traits.locale_text: 「彼がこの船に乗るのを二度と見たくはありませんな。たとえ、サーヴィターとしてであっても。ですが…サーヴィターとなれば、最低でも何らかの有益なことをもたらし得るやもしれません。結局、誰かが汚れ仕事をせねばならないのですから。{n} ファクトタムの肥大した顔が険しくなる。{/n}「あの不運な日、彼は私たち全員を恐怖に陥れたのですよ、ロード・キャプテン。そして、やはり率直に言うとマスター・ボイドヴィルと共にある日は、楽しいものではありませんでした。それでも、私は彼が自分の仕事のやり方を知っている男だと信じていました。残念なことに、私は間違っていたのです。クンラッドには、囁きの主の最も重要な資質である、ローグトレーダーに対する揺るぎない忠誠心が欠けていたことがわかったのです。そして彼の失敗は、最も嘆かわしい形で明るみに出たのです」

languages.text: "Hoffentlich setzt er nie wieder einen Fuß an Bord dieses Schiffs, nicht einmal als Servitor. Obwohl ... dann könnte er wenigstens mal etwas Nützliches tun. Irgendjemand muss schließlich die Latrinen putzen." {n}Das aufgedunsene Gesicht des Faktotums wird ernst.{/n} "Er hat uns an diesem schicksalhaften Tag alle in Todesangst versetzt, Lord Captain. Und dennoch, offen gesagt ... ich mochte Meister Voigtvirs Gesellschaft nie, hielt ihn aber für einen Mann, der seine Arbeit beherrscht. Leider war das ein Irrtum: Kunrad mangelte es an der wichtigsten Eigenschaft eines Meisters des Geflüsters – unerschütterliche Loyalität gegenüber dem Freihändler. Und dieser Mangel kam auf die denkbar abstoßendste Art und Weise ans Licht."
languages.original_text: "I hope I never see him set foot aboard this vessel again, not even as a servitor. Although... he would be able to do at least some good that way. Someone has to clean the latrines, after all." {n}The Factotum's bloated face grows stern.{/n} "He gave us all quite a fright on that ill-fated day, Lord Captain. And still, to speak candidly... I never enjoyed Master Voigtvir's company, but I believed him to be a man who knew how to do his job. Regretfully, I was mistaken: it turned out Kunrad lacked the most important quality for a Master of Whispers — unwavering loyalty to the Rogue Trader. And his failing came to light in the most deplorable manner."

traits.locale_text: "Hoffentlich setzt er nie wieder einen Fuß an Bord dieses Schiffs, nicht einmal als Servitor. Obwohl ... dann könnte er wenigstens mal etwas Nützliches tun. Irgendjemand muss schließlich die Latrinen putzen." {n}Das aufgedunsene Gesicht des Faktotums wird ernst.{/n} "Er hat uns an diesem schicksalhaften Tag alle in Todesangst versetzt, Lord Captain. Und dennoch, offen gesagt ... ich mochte Meister Voigtvirs Gesellschaft nie, hielt ihn aber für einen Mann, der seine Arbeit beherrscht. Leider war das ein Irrtum: Kunrad mangelte es an der wichtigsten Eigenschaft eines Meisters des Geflüsters – unerschütterliche Loyalität gegenüber dem Freihändler. Und dieser Mangel kam auf die denkbar abstoßendste Art und Weise ans Licht."

languages.text: « J'espère ne jamais le revoir monter à bord de ce vaisseau, pas même comme servitor. Cela étant dit... il pourrait enfin se rendre utile. Quelqu'un doit bien nettoyer les latrines, après tout. » {n}Le visage bouffi du factotum s'assombrit.{/n} « Il nous a fait une grosse frayeur en ce jour maudit, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Et pourtant, pour vous donner le fond de ma pensée... Bien que je n'ai jamais apprécié la compagnie de maître Voigtvir, je l'ai cru capable d'assumer ses fonctions. Une regrettable erreur, hélas. Kunrad était dépourvu de la qualité essentielle d'un maître des murmures : une loyauté sans faille au libre-marchand. Et sa félonie s'est manifestée de la façon la plus déplorable qui se puisse imaginer. »
languages.original_text: "I hope I never see him set foot aboard this vessel again, not even as a servitor. Although... he would be able to do at least some good that way. Someone has to clean the latrines, after all." {n}The Factotum's bloated face grows stern.{/n} "He gave us all quite a fright on that ill-fated day, Lord Captain. And still, to speak candidly... I never enjoyed Master Voigtvir's company, but I believed him to be a man who knew how to do his job. Regretfully, I was mistaken: it turned out Kunrad lacked the most important quality for a Master of Whispers — unwavering loyalty to the Rogue Trader. And his failing came to light in the most deplorable manner."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère ne jamais le revoir monter à bord de ce vaisseau, pas même comme servitor. Cela étant dit... il pourrait enfin se rendre utile. Quelqu'un doit bien nettoyer les latrines, après tout. » {n}Le visage bouffi du factotum s'assombrit.{/n} « Il nous a fait une grosse frayeur en ce jour maudit, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Et pourtant, pour vous donner le fond de ma pensée... Bien que je n'ai jamais apprécié la compagnie de maître Voigtvir, je l'ai cru capable d'assumer ses fonctions. Une regrettable erreur, hélas. Kunrad était dépourvu de la qualité essentielle d'un maître des murmures : une loyauté sans faille au libre-marchand. Et sa félonie s'est manifestée de la façon la plus déplorable qui se puisse imaginer. »

languages.text: "Umarım bir daha bu gemiye hizmetör olarak dahi ayak bastığını görmem. Gerçi... Öyle gelse bir faydası dokunurdu. Ne de olsa tuvaletlerin de temizlenmesi lazım." {n}Kâhya'nın dolgun yüzü sertleşiyor.{/n} "O talihsiz günde hepimizin ödünü patlattı Lord Kaptan. Yine de dürüst olmak gerekirse... Üstat Voigtvir'in yoldaşlığından en başından hazzetmemiştim lakin işini bilen bir adam olduğunu sanıyordum. Heyhat yanılmışım. Kunrad'ın bir Fısıltı Üstadı için en önemli nitelikten yoksun olduğu ortaya çıktı: Hür Tacir'e sarsılmaz sadakat. Başarısızlığı da en içler acısı şekilde gün yüzüne çıktı."
languages.original_text: "I hope I never see him set foot aboard this vessel again, not even as a servitor. Although... he would be able to do at least some good that way. Someone has to clean the latrines, after all." {n}The Factotum's bloated face grows stern.{/n} "He gave us all quite a fright on that ill-fated day, Lord Captain. And still, to speak candidly... I never enjoyed Master Voigtvir's company, but I believed him to be a man who knew how to do his job. Regretfully, I was mistaken: it turned out Kunrad lacked the most important quality for a Master of Whispers — unwavering loyalty to the Rogue Trader. And his failing came to light in the most deplorable manner."

Ne de olsa tuvaletlerin de temizlenmesi lazım." {n}Kâhya'nın dolgun yüzü sertleşiyor.{/n} "O talihsiz günde hepimizin ödünü patlattı Lord Kaptan. Yine de dürüst olmak gerekirse... Üstat Voigtvir'in yoldaşlığından en başından hazzetmemiştim lakin işini bilen bir adam olduğunu sanıyordum. Heyhat yanılmışım. Kunrad'ın bir Fısıltı Üstadı için en önemli nitelikten yoksun olduğu ortaya çıktı: Hür Tacir'e sarsılmaz sadakat. Başarısızlığı da en içler acısı şekilde gün yüzüne çıktı."
